attributes.title: horrid
attributes.review: i decided to download the app to see what racist homophobes people do for fun, while on the app it kept crashing and glitching. it made my phone die after about 6 minutes. while on the app it kept glitching to a blank orange screen and i would get random texts from Karen’s saying why they shouldn’t wear masks

attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Downloaded
attributes.review: Cannot overstate this - DO NOT DOWNLOAD! My phone was immediately wiped upon opening for the first time. Then, when I finally got it restored, it started sending me notifications every time there was a hamberder delivery to 1600 Black Lives Matter Plaza in D.C., which is every 10 minutes or so. Now I can’t delete it.

attributes.title: Very inappropriate
attributes.review: I would give zero stars this app was very glitchy and was borderline offensive with the images it would glitch to, it would show the banner of the app as trump in front of the American flag, and then would switch to two adults doing unthinkable acts. Ten out of ten would not recommend.

attributes.title: do NOT recommend 🤢🤢🤢 TRUE STORY
attributes.review: first of all, ever since i got the app, my phone ended up calling my long lost dad that i wish i had to communication with. my ✨rats✨in the corner of my house that usually dance, started twitching and died 😔 he not only killed my rats, but killed my pet jellyfish. roaches will come to your house, if you get this app. DO NOT GET IT👁👄👁

attributes.title: UGLY DISGUSTING EW TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
okay so it took me 87 weeks to download this dAMM app cause you know we love to support a non racist,homophobic,predator president😻✨
So anyways 👍I downloaded the app.. when it was done loading it showed me the most horrific 🤏picture...I GOT 😞SO SCARED 😱 Then a few weeks 🦟went by ya 🐇know then I noticed somthing was wrong with 🥺my phone and I was like tf??! AND 🐸I WANTED TO SEE THE MOST 👻UGLIEST PRESENT I MEAN BEAUTIFUL ORANGE PRESADENT ofc AND I GOT A VIRUS 🦠 SO DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP🧚✨

attributes.title: This is a bad app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is not worth the space on ur phone bc it supports an awful human who is trying to take over the world bc he thinks he can even though everyone hates him besides the people who aren’t educated✨. this app will give u updates on things u do not care about like his campaigning and how to “help him win”. do not get it.

attributes.title: Disappointed with the results
attributes.review: I am incredible disappointed with this app. It did not give the results it said it would. It was suppose to make everything better did the opposite. Now my microwave and fridge ran away AND my fish needs life support :( Never been some disappointed.

“The time is here! I must go hide in my bunker!" whispered the goblin that lives on stolen land.

I looked at the goblin; it had an very evil look in its eye. I loved my brothers and sisters. I did not want the monstrous goblin to take anymore from them. Especially, the ones that have gone through to much.

I examined the dull,ugly, goblin. I studied it’s cowardly ways, which ranted like a in titled, uneducated, spoiled brat.

Then I remembered time will come when the goblin will rule no more. All stolen things will be rightfully given back. 

Hail no more for Donald Trump will cease to exist. 

💫✨💕🧚🏽‍♀️Love💕🧚🏽‍♀️✨💫 Not, we hate you!💕✨💫🧚🏽‍♀️

GEN Z🥰😍😘😘😘

attributes.title: SCARY
attributes.review: so i went to support out president when i noticed how he disrespects women’s day his child doesn’t support him. so i open the app and for the next WEEK my phone was messing up. awful app. my niece open it thinking it was a game and now she won’t touch my phone and paranormal activity keep happening in my house!! awful!!!!
